name: TSUADA: The Super Ultimate Dodge Adventure
name_original: TSUADA: The Super Ultimate Dodge Adventure
description:
In this retro shoot'em up game, you control a spaceship and must avoid or break asteroids. More you survive, more there are asteroids. All asteroids give points and the goal is to have the best score.

You can also play hardcore mode : you must survive and dodge asteroids at high speed.
